properties.entry: INSERT INTO personnelinsecure (first, last, zip, department) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?)
INSERT INTO personnelinsecure (first, last, zip, department) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?) RETURNING id
UPDATE personnelinsecure SET last = ? WHERE ID = ?
INSERT INTO personnel (first, last, zip, department) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?)
INSERT INTO personnel (first, last, zip, department) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?) RETURNING id
UPDATE personnel SET last = ? WHERE ID = ?
